Package com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldAccessor<T>
    Defines the methods to access a certain field
    MethodAccessor<T>
    Defines the methods to access a certain method
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CBClassTemplate
    A Class Template meant for pointing to a Class in the org.bukkit.craftbukkit Package
    Automatically deals with package versioning
    The empty constructor can be used to initialize this Class using the current Class name
    ClassBuilder
    A simple implementation builder that allows the creation of extensions of classes.
    ClassTemplate<T>
    Uses reflection to transfer/copy all the fields of a class
    NMSClassTemplate
    A Class Template meant for pointing to a Class in the net.minecraft.server Package
    Automatically deals with package versioning
    The empty constructor can be used to initialize this Class using the current Class name
    SafeConstructor<T>
    A safe version of the Constructor
    SafeDirectField<T>
    A field implementation that allows direct getting and setting
    SafeDirectMethod<T>
    A method implementation that allows direct invoking
    SafeField<T>
    Wraps around the java.lang.reflect.Field class to provide an error-free alternative
    Exceptions are logged, isValid can be used to check if the Field is actually working
    SafeMethod<T>
    Wraps around the java.lang.reflect.Method class to provide an error-free alternative
    Exceptions are logged, isValid can be used to check if the Method is actually working
    TranslatorFieldAccessor<T>
    A field accessor that can translate from one type to another to expose a different type than is stored
